title: Trim Videos
description: Drag the triangle handles on the playback bar to trim videos. The blue duration display shows your trimmed length.

title: Apply LUTs
description: Select a LUT from the dropdown to preview color grading. Check 'Bake LUT' to apply it permanently during export.

title: Quick Deletion
description: Click the red X button or press Delete/Backspace to flag videos for deletion. They'll be removed during processing.

title: Gallery Mode
description: Toggle between vertical list and horizontal gallery view using the icon in the video player corner.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Use ↑/↓ arrow keys to navigate between videos, Space to play/pause, and Delete to flag for removal.

title: Sony XML Support
description: Place Sony XML sidecar files next to your videos to automatically import camera metadata like S-Log3 settings.

title: LUT Auto-Mapping
description: The app learns your LUT preferences! When you apply a LUT to a specific camera profile, it remembers for next time.

title: Rename Videos
description: Double-click the filename to rename videos. Choose naming conventions in Preferences for batch operations.

title: Star Ratings
description: Click the stars to rate your videos from 1-5. Use ratings to organize and prioritize your best footage.

title: Quality Preservation
description: Trimmed videos maintain original quality, codec, and frame rate. LUT baking uses highest quality re-encoding.

title: External Media Staging
description: Working from SD cards? Enable staging to copy files to local storage first for faster processing.

title: FCPXML Export
description: Export your processed video list to Final Cut Pro XML format. Enable it in the welcome screen or use the button after processing.

title: Test Mode
description: Enable Test Mode in Preferences to preview changes without modifying original files. Perfect for experimenting!

title: Cull In Place
description: Set the output folder to the same as input to process videos in place. Be careful—deleted files go to Trash!

title: Batch Operations
description: Process multiple videos at once. Changes to trim points, LUTs, and deletion flags all happen in one processing job.

title: Video Metadata
description: View detailed technical specs including resolution, frame rate, codec, and file size for every video.

title: Scrubbing Preview
description: Drag the trim handles to see live preview frames. Makes finding the perfect in/out points easy!

title: Default Folders
description: Set default source and output folders in Preferences to skip folder selection and start culling faster.
